title: The Room 2003 720p Riffv2 Riffv1 6ch 2ch 5subs
description:
The.Room.2003.720p.Riffv2.Riffv1.6ch.2ch.5subs.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS Rifftrax V2 2016 LIVE SCRIPT
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK3 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK4 FOR 2.0

QUAD-AUDIO: RIFFTRAX-2016, RIFFTRAX-2009, 5.1 MOVIE ONLY, 2.0 MOVIE ONLY
FIVE SUBTITLES: ENGLISH, FRENCH, ITALIAN, RUSSIAN, SPANISH

The Room (2003)
video: 1280x720 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax V2 2016 Live Script AAC 2.0
audio2: movie plus Rifftrax V1 2009 Original AAC 2.0
audio3: just movie AAC 5.1 Surround
audio4: just movie AAC 2.0 Stereo
built in subs, off by default, not hard coded: eng, fre, ita, rus, spa
Riffers: Bill Corbett, Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson
intro: 1s after the last riff comment
1h39m51s 1,975,505,507bytes
2016.03.09 Rifftrax V2 2016 Live Script
2009.06.18 Rifftrax V1 2009 Original
2003.06.27 Movie USA Release
  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0368226/  

This is a quad-audio remux including: the new "Rifftrax V2 2016 Live Script" commentary (default) and the "Rifftrax V1 2009 Original" plus 2 movie only tracks, 5.1 surround and 2.0 stereo. The Rifftrax audio tracks have been remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Additionally this version of The Room with Rifftrax has 5 subtitles: English, French, Italian, Russian, and Spanish. The subs are built in, off by default, not hard coded, and they're software switchable. Each of the subs were re-synchronized to ensure they line up with this encode.

Big thanks to the posters of the 720p/5.1 encode of the movies, and the subs.

If this Rifftrax was enjoyable, you haven't paid for it and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing this riff (3.99USD) or make a general donation via CCard, PPal, Bitcoin/Dogecoin/Litecoin or wallet payment apps at  

Please check out other releases of Rifftrax, MST3K, Battlestar Galactica, Gotham, DC Comics, documentaries, Star Trek Enterprise and more at:
  https://thepiratebay.se/user/bsg4you/  
  https://kat.cr/user/bsg4you/uploads/  
and leave any corrections, criticism, comments and requests.

Thanks, bsg4you
